评论概述: A fine Dress Shirt, Roomy, Comfortable,Nice Fabric
评论详情: I was very pleased with the fit, the look and the comfort of this shirt. I had hesitations about buying it because the manufacturer "Coofandy" can sometimes provides an odd fabric or odd design choices, so I'm never sure what I'm going to get despite the pictures. About half of what I order from them gets returned, but that's not a big problem because returns for their products are easy.  On the other hand, I"ve recently experimented with some other products they make and have been very pleased. This year I've been particularly happy with their linen shirts and pants.  Back to this shirt, they call it a Dress Shirt and it really is a very nice dress shirts that would look great with formal business attire. But it also looks great as a casual shirt too.  I will continue to try their products.

评论概述: Best dress shirt decision you'll make
评论详情: These really are some quality dress shirts. They're breathable but not thin; they're flowy but compliment the body. It's easy to dress up or down in these, especially with the sporty white line on the inner shirt that can flash when you unbutton the two top buttons and get that nice curvy "V" to accent your chest and neck. These shirts can make you feel like a boss or feel like "the man who gets h****". For size recommendations: I bought a medium shirt; I wear a "40R" in suit jackets, so use that as reference to gauge which size you should go for. If you wear 36R and below, definitely the "S". You don't want it baggy but you also don't want it tight.
